content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production (Position 0,0 and 2,0)
Two furnaces dedicated to producing iron plates:
- Furnace 1 at (0,0) with coal fuel (25) and no ingredients
- Furnace 2 at (2,0) with coal fuel (25) and no ingredients
Both furnaces are idle due to lack of ingredients

### Copper Plate Production (Position 4,4 and 6,4)
Two furnaces dedicated to producing copper plates:
- Furnace 3 at (4,4) with coal fuel (28) and no ingredients
- Furnace 4 at (6,4) with coal fuel (29) and no ingredients
Both furnaces are idle due to lack of ingredients

### Power Generation System (Position -7.5, 18.5)
Complete power generation setup consisting of:
- Steam engine at (-7.5, 18.5), working status, containing 200 steam at 165°
- Boiler at (-7.5, 22.0), working with 2 coal, containing water (199.99) and steam (199.96)
- Offshore pump at (-7.5, 25.5), working status, containing water (99.96)
- Connected pipe groups:
  - Steam pipes at (-7.5, 15.5)
  - Empty pipes at (-7.5, 20.5)
  - Water pipes at (-8.5, 23.5)
- Electricity distribution network with multiple poles at positions (-9.5,18.5), (-5.5,18.5), (-1.5,18.5), (-0.5,5.5), (3.5,7.5), (7.5,7.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Lab Related Errors
- Lab entity is missing from the map
- Ensure lab is properly placed before attempting to access it
- Verify lab recipe requirements before crafting (needs iron gear wheels, electronic circuits, and transport belts)
- Cannot place lab without having it in inventory first

### Research Prerequisites Errors
- Check technology prerequisites before starting research
- Steel Processing must be researched before Advanced Material Processing
- Verify research requirements are met before attempting to start new research

### Resource Management
- Monitor coal levels in boiler to prevent running out of fuel
- Keep track of ore supplies to maintain continuous plate production
- Ensure furnaces have both fuel and ingredients to operate efficiently

### Entity Placement and Access
- Verify entity existence at specified coordinates before attempting to access
- Double check coordinates when trying to access specific entities
- Ensure required items are in inventory before attempting to place new entities

### Production Management
- Monitor furnace ingredient levels to prevent idle time
- Keep track of fuel levels in all production buildings
- Balance production between iron and copper based on needs

### Inventory Management
- Check inventory contents before attempting to use or place items
- Maintain adequate supplies of basic materials for crafting
- Keep track of science pack requirements for research
